title: Close to You
alt: We should probably talk about this before the wedding.
transcript:
[Cueball singing to zombie Megan, who has wiggly lines and unkempt hair. Musical notes appear around Cueball's words.]
Cueball: Why do birds suddenly appearCueball: Every tiiiime you are neeearCueball: Wait, are those turkey vultures?Cueball: Okay, listen, are you a zombie?
Megan: Hurrghhh...
